songs.title: Last Night Last
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
There's a towel on the bathroom door
A T-shirt in my dresser if you like
And I'll go put the coffee on
I'll pour a cup for you if you've got the time

[Pre-Chorus]
All these years, we've been nothin' but friends
And even though, we didn't plan on this

[Chorus]
Can last night last
Or was it just too much red wine, or one too many lonely nights
Can last night last
And could this be the start of us, every mornin' wakin' up
To your sleepy eyes smilin' back
Or is it just too soon to ask, can last night last

[Verse 2]
I probably should be goin' now
'Cause I'm, not quite sure what to say
I'm so afraid you might get scared
If I told you how much I want to stay

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Here we are, somewhere between lovers and friends
Is this the end, or where it begins

[Chorus]
Can last night last
Or was it just too much red wine, or one too many lonely nights
Can last night last
And could this be the start of us, every mornin' wakin' up
To your sleepy eyes smilin' back
Or is it just too soon to ask, can last night last

[Bridge]
Years after forever, in love you gotta take a chance, yeah

[Outro]
Can last night last
Could this be the start of us, every mornin' wakin' up
To your sleepy eyes smilin' back
If it's not too much to ask, can last night last
Oh, can last night last
